__data__.text:
Faizan Attar
Linux System Administrator | Infrastructure & Automation Engineer
Phone: 9113207626 | Email: faizan.attar21@gmail.com
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Linux System Administrator with 5+ years of experience managing large-scale enterprise RHEL
environments (8500+ servers) across Production, QA, and Test landscapes. Skilled in Linux
operations, system performance tuning, LVM/storage management, OS patching, firmware
upgrades, RedHat Satellite migrations, and automation using Ansible & Bash. Strong experience in
incident/change management, enterprise monitoring, server hardening, and cloud VM
administration (Azure).
WORK EXPERIENCE
HCL Technologies — Bangalore, India
Linux System Administrator | July 2021 – Present
Core Responsibilities (Technical & ATS-Optimized)
 Administering and troubleshooting 8500+ RHEL servers (RHEL 6/7/8/9).
 Handling kernel-level issues (OOM kills, panics, crash dumps) using kdump, crash, sosreport.
 Deep performance tuning using vmstat, iostat, sar, pidstat, netstat, ss, perf, strace.
 LVM management (PV/VG/LV creation/expansion/snapshots/repairs).
 Disk provisioning: SAN, vSAN, Azure, AWS EBS.
 Filesystem troubleshooting: XFS repair, journal issues, inode problems.
 OS patching using Ansible Tower & RedHat Satellite (CVs, LCEs, AKs).
 Handling patch failures: dependency conflicts, repo issues, GPG failures.
 Automating pre/post checks using Ansible ad-hoc commands.
 Deploying/troubleshooting Qualys & BigFix agents.
 OS-level support for SAP/HANA (tuned profiles, NTP, mounts, memory checks).
 Tuning kernel & performance params (THP, swapiness, sysctl, I/O scheduler).
 Firmware, driver & kernel upgrades; iDRAC/ILO configuration.
 Managing NFS, CIFS, EFS, multipath, SAN LUN provisioning.
 Handling P1/P2 incidents, RCA creation, log analysis.
 Network troubleshooting: DNS, routing, MTU, VLANs, bonding.
 Automation using Ansible playbooks (agents, restarts, validations).
 LDAP/SSSD/Kerberos user access troubleshooting.
 Creating SOPs, RCAs, runbooks, and internal KBs.
Key Projects
 Dell Server Firmware & iDRAC Upgrade Project.
 Automated OS Migration (RHEL 7 → 8 → 9) using Kickstart + Satellite.
 Automated Root FS Extension for 2000+ servers (Ansible).
 Azure SAP Servers LVM Migration (SSD v1 → v2).
 BigFix & Qualys Agent Deployment Automation.
Cerner India Healthcare
System Engineer | April 2020 – July 2021
Core Responsibilities
 Provisioned EC2 instances, VPCs, security groups, storage, networking.
 Configured Apache HTTP Server for application hosting.
 Automated Node.js, AngularJS, PostgreSQL installations using Ansible.
 Managed GitHub/Bitbucket repos and branching strategies.
 DNS management using Route 53 & GoDaddy.
 EBS/EFS management, resizing, filesystem extension.
 Upgraded EC2 compute (CPU/RAM) based on performance needs.
 Managed IAM roles, users, policies, keys.

 Configured SSL/TLS via AWS Certificate Manager.
 Infrastructure monitoring using CloudWatch.
EDUCATION
Master of Computer Applications (MCA), VTU — 2018 (73%)
CERTIFICATIONS
Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA) — 190-304-311
